oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Fowler Mine
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Fowler Mine at Bumpass Cove. Shows workers gathered together for a group shot and men on horseback.
The Fowler Zinc Mine is near Erwin, Tennessee. Historically the site has been associated with the Bumpus-Embreeville Mining District which is now part of the Cherokee National Forest.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Horses; Mining; Zinc mining; Miners
